tasks.label: build_dir_little

tasks.label: build_dir_debug_little
tasks.command: if [ ! -d ./build_debug_little ]; then mkdir build_debug_little; else cd build_debug_little && rm -rf * ;fi

tasks.label: create_links_debug_little
tasks.command: cd test_debug_little && ln -s ../test_files/dns.ini dns.ini && ln -s ../build_debug_little/inigrid.x inigrid.x && ln -s ../build_debug_little/inirand.x inirand.x  && ln -s ../build_debug_little/iniscal.x iniscal.x   && ln -s ../build_debug_little/iniflow.x iniflow.x && ln -s ../build_debug_little/dns.x dns.x

tasks.label: run_ini_debug_little
tasks.command: cd test_debug_little && ./inigrid.x && ./inirand.x && ./iniflow.x && ./iniscal.x && mv flow.ics.1 flow.0.1 && mv flow.ics.2 flow.0.2 && mv flow.ics.3 flow.0.3 && mv scal.ics.1 scal.0.1
